package.name: ip64
package.author: Thor Weinreich
package.description: Replace :ipv4 with your external IPv4 and :ip6 with your IPv6 (Linux and MacOS)
package.title: IPv4 and IPv6

manifest.author: Thor Weinreich
manifest.description: Replace :ipv4 with your external IPv4 and :ip6 with your IPv6 (Linux and MacOS)
manifest.name: ip64
manifest.title: IPv4 and IPv6

value.readme:
# ip64

- needs `curl` to be installed so it should work on Linux and MacOS
- replace `:ip4` with your external IPv4
- replace `:ip6` with your external IPv6
- uses [ipfy API](https://www.ipify.org/)

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
# ip64 package

matches:
  - trigger: ":ip4"
    replace: "{{output}}"
    vars:
      - name: output
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: "echo $(curl https://api.ipify.org)"

  - trigger: ":ip6"
    replace: "{{output}}"
    vars:
      - name: output
        type: shell
        params:
          cmd: "echo $(curl https://api64.ipify.org)"
